member.name: T:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Interviews.VariableData
member.summary: Represents the response(s) given to a variable in the survey

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Interviews.VariableData.Ident
member.summary: The Ident of the variable

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Interviews.VariableData.ResponseMetadata
member.summary: (For closed-end variables) Provides information about the options used for this variable in the current interview

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Interviews.VariableData.Data
member.summary: List of responses given for this variable

member.name: T:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Interviews.VariableValue
member.summary: Contains data about the closed-end responses used for a given variable and interview

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Interviews.VariableValue.Ident
member.summary: Id of a closed end response (refers to Metadata.VariableValues.Ident)

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Interviews.VariableValue.Shown
member.summary: Flag indicating whether this response was shown for a given interview

member.name: T:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Section
member.summary: Represents a logical section within a survey (e.g. Demographics)

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Section.Sections
member.summary: List of sub-sections (if any) within this section

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.SurveyMetadataBase.Variables
member.summary: List of variables (if any) defined at the root level of the survey

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.SurveyMetadataBase.Sections
member.summary: List of sub-sections (if any) defined at the root level of the survey

member.name: T:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable
member.summary: A variable or question within a survey

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.Ident
member.summary: Unique identifier for this variable

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.Ordinal
member.summary: The order of this variable within the overall survey

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.Type
member.summary: The type of variable (e.g. Open, closed, loop etc..)

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.Name
member.summary: Human-readable name for this variable

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.Label
member.summary: Label or question text for the variable

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.Use
member.summary: Special use type (e.g. language, weighting) for this variable

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.Values
member.summary: Any pre-defined responses for this variable

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.MaxResponses
member.summary: Maximum number of responses that can be given for this variable

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.LoopedVariables
member.summary: Looped child variables for this variable (when type = Loop)

member.name: P:TSAPI.Public.Domain.Metadata.Variable.OtherSpecifyVariables
member.summary: List of other specify child variables for this variable (when type = Single or Multiple)
